sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-alert
      border="left"
      close-text
      dismissible
      dark
      color="green accent-4"
      v-if="show"
    >
      Thêm thành công!
    </v-alert>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-form
            ref="form"
            @submit.prevent="submitForm"
            class="pa-5"
            enctype="multipart/form-data"
          >
            <v-text-field v-model="products.name" label="name" :rules="rules">
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.qty"
              label="số luọng"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="products.price" label="price" :rules="rules">
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.detail"
              label="detail"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            
            <v-file-input
              label="select image"
              @change="selectFile"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-file-input>
            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">add</v-btn>
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import API from "@/services/api.product";
export default {
  name: "add-pro",
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is requied"],
      products: {
        name: "",
        qty: "",
        price: "",
        detail: "",
        image: "",
      },
      image: "",
      show: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    selectFile(file) {
      this.image = file;
      console.log(file);

      // console.log( file.target.files[0].name);
    },
    async submitForm() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append("image", this.image);
      formData.append("name", this.products.name);
      formData.append("qty", this.products.qty);
      formData.append("price", this.products.price);
      formData.append("detail", this.products.detail);
      console.log("cjlksdjf");
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        const res = await API.addProduct(formData);
        if (res) {
          this.show = true;
          this.$refs.form.reset();
        }
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
